keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in a state of the art hospital at Addenbrookes integrating services from across Cambridgeshire. I'm supporting our NHS to give people the care they need now and making sure it's there for our children and grandchildren.
More per pupil funding for primary & secondary schools including investing an additional £700M in SEND provision. As a scientist and teacher I know improving education improves life.
Investing in A428 upgrade, Investing in South Cambridge Railway station and opposing the introduction of a City Congestion Charge making Cambridge a better place to live and work.
